extendedInfo.description: This is to be the venue of the wedding of Kate and Wills on the 29th April, read about this wonderful and historic setting for this royal event and feel the 1000 years of history.Fantastic insight into the iconic Westminster Abbey, home of the coronations and weddings of the Monarchs of England. The book is presented as a tour around the Abbey, with the history of the abbey and location woven into the tour. Complete with great illustrations of many facets of the Abbey.
